message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This price reflects the product's worth while acknowledging your budget constraints.
Hello Alice, I understand the value of the product, but I am still aiming to keep my expenses within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price of $12,000?
